game_description: View YOUR models securely in an immersive virtual environment. SECURE Built with security in mind! - Enterprise login support including 2FA - Data stays secure in OneDrive cloud storage EASY TO EXPLORE - Drive, fly, or teleport your way through a scene - Reach out and grab a part, and scale it up or down - Explode a CAD assembly - Slice through a model to see whatâ€™s inside READY FOR DESIGN REVIEWS - Mark up models with a pen - Take measurements - Upload screen shots to OneDrive
